      • render

        public abstract void render(int mouseX,
                            int mouseY,
                            float partialTicks)
        Parameters:
        mouseX - relative to the element position
        mouseY - relative to the element position
        partialTicks - percentage of time passed till the next tick

      • isHovered

        public boolean isHovered(int mouseX,
                         int mouseY)
        Parameters:
        mouseX - relative to the element
        mouseY - relative to the element
        Returns:
        whether the mouse is above this molecule

      • attach

        public void attach(MoleculaGui moleculaGui)

      • mouseClicked

        public void mouseClicked(int mouseX,
                         int mouseY,
                         int mouseButton)
        Called when a click event is received. This is called regardless if the element is hovered or not.
        Parameters:
        mouseX - relative to the element
        mouseY - relative to the element
        mouseButton - mouse button as provided by LWJGL

      • keyTyped

        public boolean keyTyped(char typedChar,
                        int keyCode)
        Called when this molecule is focussed and a key is pressed.
        Parameters:
        typedChar - the character responding to this key
        keyCode - the key code responding to this key

      • requestFocus

        public void requestFocus()
        Brings this molecule into focus. Has no effect if the molecule is not attached to a MoleculaGui

      • isFocussed

        public boolean isFocussed()
        Returns:
        whether this molecule is focussed by the current host

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Executed once per tick while this molecule is being attached.
